original_text: “‘Do not cut the hair at the sides of your head or clip off the edges of your beard.
korean_text: 머리 가를 둥글게 깎지 말며 수염 끝을 손상하지 말며

sentences.original_text: Do not cut the hair at the sides of your head
sentences.korean_translation: 네 머리 옆 머리카락을 자르지 말라

sentences.original_text: or clip off the edges of your beard
sentences.korean_translation: 또 네 수염 끝을 깎지 말라
